nodes.bodyText: These changes must roll out before any changes that writes such steps to ZK?

Well, a non-upgraded controller will be unable to read (to modify or display) the run status for any staging test that has been started by an upgraded controller, until it upgrades itself. I don't think that's a major consequence.
Of course you’re right it’s the right thing to do, but I’m impatient and I don’t think it’ll be an actual problem here :P
